data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On December 5 2025

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Tenneco Clean Air India Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from November 19 2025 the Equity Shares of Tenneco Clean Air India Ltd (Scrip Code: 544612) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251118- dated November 18 2025.
